content: संविश् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To enter. {@--2@} To sleep, lie down to rest; संविष्टः कुशशयने निशां निनाय <ls>R. 1. 95</ls>; क्रमेण सुप्तामनु संविवेश <ls n="R.">2. 24</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 55</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">7. 225.</ls> {@--3@} To cohabit, have sexual intercourse with; षोडशर्तुनिशाः स्त्री णां तस्मिन् युग्मासु संविशेत् <ls>Y. 1. 79</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 48.</ls> {@--4@} To enjoy. {@--5@} To engage oneself in.
